data.enText: if the police arrest sb, the person is taken to a police station and kept there because the police believe they may be guilty of a crime

data.chText: 一名男子因与这桩抢劫案有关已被逮捕。
data.enText: A man has been arrested in connection with the robbery.

data.chText: 她因涉嫌毒品犯罪而被捕。
data.enText: She was arrested for drug-related offences.

data.chText: 你干那种事可能要遭逮捕。
data.enText: You could get arrested for doing that.
to stop a process or a development

data.chText: 他们未能阻止公司的衰落。
data.enText: They failed to arrest the company's decline.
to make sb notice sth and pay attention to it

data.chText: 一阵不寻常的嘈杂声引起了他的注意。
data.enText: An unusual noise arrested his attention .
if sb arrests , their heart stops beating

data.chText: 他在送往医院途中停止了心跳。
data.enText: He arrested on the way to the hospital.

data.chText: 她因涉嫌谋杀而被逮捕。
data.enText: She was under arrest on suspicion of murder.
Opposition leaders were put under house arrest (= not allowed to leave their houses) .
an act of sth stopping or being interrupted
He died after suffering a cardiac arrest (= when his heart suddenly stopped) .

simple_means.memory_skill: ar 表加强 + rest 休息 → 强制休息 → 逮捕

ex.enText: He was arrested by the police.
His friend was arrested for fraud.

synonyms.bx: 指对罪犯或犯罪嫌疑人进行拘捕并予以监禁或拘留。

ex.enText: He was captured in a battle.

ex.chText: 那只老虎终于被捕获了。

synonyms.bx: 指通过使用武力或计谋等捉住人或动物并将其关押。
普通用词，多指通过追踪、武力、突袭等捉住跑动或隐藏中的人或动物。

ex.chText: 那个小女孩突然抓住他的胳膊。
ex.enText: Suddenly the little girl seized his arm.

ex.chText: 谁抓住了受惊的马的缰绳？
ex.enText: Who seized the reins of the spooked horse?

tr: the act of apprehending (especially apprehending a criminal)
example: the policeman on the beat got credit for the collar

tr: the state of inactivity following an interruption
example: during the halt he got some lunch
the momentary stay enabled him to escape the blow
he spent the entire stop in his seat

tr: hold back, as of a danger or an enemy
check the expansion or influence of
example: Check the growth of communism in South East Asia
Turn back the tide of communism
the police nabbed the suspected criminals
Catch the attention of the waiter

value.def: If the police arrest you, they take charge of you and take you to a police station, because they believe you may have committed a crime.

example.ex: Police arrested five young men in connection with one of the attacks...
example.tran: 警方逮捕了与其中一次袭击有关的5名青年男子。

example.ex: The police say seven people were arrested for minor offences.
example.tran: 警方称有7人因轻罪被捕。

example.ex: ...a substantial reward for information leading to the arrest of the bombers...
example.tran: 为抓捕放置炸弹者提供线索的人设置的巨额奖金

example.ex: Police chased the fleeing terrorists and later made two arrests...
example.tran: 警方追踪逃跑的恐怖分子，后来逮捕了其中两人。

example.ex: Murder squad detectives approached the man and placed him under arrest.
example.tran: 凶杀侦破组警探靠近那名男子，将其逮捕。

value.def: If something or someone arrests a process, they stop it continuing.

example.ex: The sufferer may have to make major changes in his or her life to arrest the disease...
example.tran: 患者可能必须对生活习惯作出重大调整以控制病情。

example.ex: The law could arrest the development of good research if applied prematurely.
example.tran: 如果草率施行，该法律将会阻滞高质量研究的进展。

value.def: If something interesting or surprising arrests your attention, you suddenly notice it and then continue to look at it or consider it carefully.

example.ex: The work of an architect of genius always arrests the attention no matter how little remains...
example.tran: 天才建筑师的作品无论残留多少都能最大限度地吸引眼球。

example.ex: As he reached the hall after her, he saw what had arrested her.
example.tran: 他跟随她到了大厅，看见了吸引她注意的东西。

example.ex: The most arresting feature is the painted wall decoration.
example.tran: 最醒目的特点是绘有图画的墙面装饰。

trans: 心脏骤停；心搏骤停；心跳骤停；心脏停搏；心搏停止
逮捕令；逮捕状；拘捕令；逮捕令案；逮捕证
心跳呼吸骤停；心肺循环骤停；心肺停止；心肺骤停
被捕；逮捕；被捕了；被逮捕
逮捕令；逮捕状；拘捕令；逮捕令案；逮捕证
呼吸停止；呼吸骤停；死于呼吸停止；死于呼吸中止；呼吸中止
心脏骤停；心跳骤停；心搏骤停；停止；突然心脏停止

partsOfSpeech.dec: ar 加强 + rest 停留 → 强制停留 → 逮捕
rest 停留 + less 不…的 → 停不下来的 → 不安的
restless 不安的；得不到休息的 + ly …地 → 不安地，慌张地

rootsaffixes.indicate: 等加在同辅音字母的词根前, 表加强
rootsaffixes.title: ab-, ac-, af-, ag-, ap-, ar-, as-, at-

partsOfSpeech.dec: ab 表加强 + brev 短 + iate 使… → 使一再变短 → 缩写
ac 表加强 + celer 速度 + ate 使… → 加快速度 → 加速
ac 表加强 + cent 唱歌 + uate 使… → 不停地唱 → 强调
ac 表加强 + company 伙伴 → 陪伴
ac 表加强 + cumul 堆积 + ate 做，造成，使… → 不断堆积 → 积累
af 表加强 + fili 子女 + ation 表结果 → 成为子女 → 入会
ag 表加强 + glomer 球状物 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成球状 → 成团
ag 表加强 + grand 大 + ize 使… → 一再大 → 扩大
ag 表加强 + grav 重 + ate 做，造成，使… →〔病〕加重 → 恶化
ag 表加强 + gress 行走 + ion 动作或状态 → 往前走 → 进攻
ap 表加强 + peas 平和 + e → 使〔人〕心态平和 → 抚慰
ap 表加强 + plaus 鼓掌 + e → 鼓掌
ap 表加强 + point 指 → 指定
ap 表加强 + preci 价值 + ate 做，造成，使… → 一再指出价值 → 欣赏
ar 表加强 + range 列 → 成列 → 安排
ar 表加强 + rest 休息 → 强制休息 → 逮捕
as 表加强 + sault 跳 → 跳起来〔争球〕→ 进攻
as 表加强 + sid 坐 + uous …的 → 一再坐着〔学习〕→ 勤奋的
as 表加强 + simil 一样 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成为相同 → 同化
as 表加强 + sist 站 → 站在一起 → 帮助
as 表加强 + soci 社会 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成为一个社会 → 联合
as 表加强 + sure 确定 → 一再确定 → 肯定
at 表加强 + tach 钉 → 牢牢钉上 → 附上
at 表加强 + tain 拿住 → 获得
at 表加强 + test 试验 → 一再试验 → 证实
at 表加强 + tract 拉 → 不断拉〔眼球〕→ 吸引
